name: attribute(_:at:longestEffectiveRange:in:)
desc: Returns the value for the attribute with the specified name of the character at the specified index and, by reference, the range where the attribute applies.
declaration:
func attribute(_ attrName: NSAttributedString.Key, 
            at location: Int, 
longestEffectiveRange range: NSRangePointer?, 
            in rangeLimit: NSRange) -> Any?
